channel.title: Client help
channel.description:
can some1 help me whenever i try to run a client this message always comes up and i have java
"'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file press any key to continue . . ." :confused:

item.title: Client help
item.dc:creator: @the_soul The Soul
item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

[quote=“needhoster, post:2, topic:241903”][quote author=joeyjoe9876 link=topic=318273.msg2524245#msg2524245 date=1226108943]
can some1 help me whenever i try to run a client this message always comes up and i have java

“‘java’ is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file
press any key to continue . . .”

[/quote]try getting a different version of java. If you don’t have JDK, then download it.[/quote]
You don’t need a different version, all you need to do is edit your enviorenmental variable settings.

Read full topic
